# [Nfb](https://nfb.ca)

Nfb Provider
Watch quality Canadian documentary, animation and fiction
films online

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Nfb
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: nfb.ca
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
